Awesome game!
Perma-death adds a serious aspect to a game that seems to be a casually played game.
The people that play this are welcoming: the stronger players will usually give you something to help you on your way.
It does have some pay-to-win type stuff, but not too strongly; You can use real money to buy coins, which you can get special armor or weapons or pets or whatever with.
Very fun to play with a group of friends.
If you see a Corrix anywhere, make sure to say hi!

For a free game, it's not too shabby. Though, to put it nicely, there are more microtransactions than game support. As long as you can download this game, play it with some friends, and get atleast 10 hours of fun out of it, then I reccommend downloading it and giving it a try.


On another note, I would not reccommend spending ANY money on this game, for if it leads to a misfortunate loss of what you paid for, you will most likely not be getting it back.
